chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: But let's talk a little about the strategy.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: There are primarily three.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: There are four.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: Three are primarily.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: First before interactive.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: Before interactive means

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: that the page you have,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: before you can interact with it,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: the script is executed.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: After this, after interactive,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: once your page has been hydrated,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: and you are able to interact with it,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: after that your script is executed.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: Lazy on load means

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: that whenever the browser has time,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: the browser says whenever I have time,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: then I will load it without any hassle.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: And I will prioritize other things.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: For example,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: if you are loading an ad on any page,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: then you may want to load it lazy.

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: Because you want that

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: the ad should not come on your page first,

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4

chunks.text: The ad will run secondary

chunks.title: Script, Link & Image components in Next.js  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #123.mp4
chunks.text: and you will run it.
